roleset.name: to make a squeaking sound
roleset.note: CREAK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'creak' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from creak.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0
example.text: As Ms. Johnson stands outside the Hammack house after winding up her chores there , the house begins to creak and sway .
